Do it. Just buy the game. Find 4 of your friends to play with and enjoy. Yes, the community is sometimes toxic, yes the game has it's bugs and issues, but overall i have put 1400 hours into this game, and about 500 dollars(which is now spend on my other games) and do not regret any of it. Just don't become toxic and you will enjoy the game.

Learning toxicity has never been easier 10/10

P.S. to the devs: releasing operations such as Wildfire, Hydra or Shattered Web more often would be very welcome
